reviewText: I have a 3 1/2 year old son who just loves the Imagination Movers!  I saw them on the Disney channel one morning and he was dancing to the song. I bought the DVD to see if he would love it and it was a hit! I just bought him the cd's now so we can listen to them in the car. If you have kids that love music, GET THIS DVD!
Title: N/A

reviewText: If your children love the movers and love to sing and dance this is for you. This is great for kids.
Title: N/A

reviewText: My little ones love this they watch it all the time..highly recommend getting this...your kids will thoroughly enjoy this movie
Title: N/A

reviewText: The Imagination Movers are a rare breed in the world of child entertainment.  It amuses children, and adults can actually like it too.  I like the Rich, Scott, Dave, and Smitty's appearance, music, and messages.  It's fun.  Their videos are definitely produced on a low budget, but the Imagination Movers are charming and fun nonethless.
Title: N/A

reviewText: My decision to buy this dvd was a bit iffy because of the other negative reviews talking about how "Low Budget" looking it is. But I took a chance and my 2 1/2 yr. old daughter loves it to death!!  She could care less about the production!  She sings along and dances her little body around! I Highly Recommend this Dvd for toddlers, believe me they're gonna love it!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I thought this was the Disney show, but it is them singing. Not bad, but my son would rather have the show itself.
